name: Population Boom
description:
A decision-making games where you need to balance stats such as: Population, Money, Food, Environment, etc. in the year 2250 and survive as ruler for 10 years.

Game was made for the August 2022 Kenney Game Jam, but was submitted 1 day late due to starting 1 day late. Theme was "Growth".

Game was made entirely out of Kenney assets except for background music.
